archimate:Assessment.name: RISK - Data Gravity
archimate:Assessment.documentation: Currently the model followed is to bring the log data to the processing point. As Cloud adoption increases the requirements around both disk and processing capacity will require constant re-evaluation and lead to increasing cost. Industry has started to think about moving the storage and processing from a centralised model to a de-centralised model which would require significant rework of the SIEM solution to accomodate.
